articles.author: Dhananjay Khatri
articles.title: European Union adopts more favourable Schengen visa rules for Indians - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Indian Nationals can now apply for a multiple entry Schengen visa with longer validity
articles.content: On April 18, 2024, the European Commission adopted specific rules on the issuing of multiple entry visas to Indian nationals, which are more favourable than the standard rules of the Visa Code that a… [+1651 chars]
